'''1.20 Pre-release 3''' (known as '''1.20-pre3''' in the launcher) is the third pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.20]], released on May 19, 2023,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-20-pre-release-2|Minecraft 1.20 Pre-Release 3|May 19, 2023}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.20 Pre-release 3
|;old
|121788|Jump boost, slow falling and levitation don't apply to ridden horses, pigs or striders until after a relog.
|135809|Armor stands with Marker tag can still activate pressure plates.
|150183|Iron golems produce walking particles for barrier blocks.
|152258|Riding an entity with slow falling will not stop fall damage.
|170468|World icons can get messed up when a world's icon is reset.
|181280|Incorrect textures can sometimes be displayed.
|221864|Iron golems produce walking particles for light blocks.
|259912|Saddled horses can infinitely retain Levitation effect.
|260653|Markers, interaction, and display entities can prevent pressure plates from deactivating.
|260903|Less recent attacker can be credited for kill.
|262684|Game icon has low resolution.
|;dev
|261202|Teleporting a display entity jitters the player riding on the stack.
|262324|Teleporting a mob while riding it doesn't work well.
|262505|Iron golems can produce particles for blocks they're not colliding with.
|262593|The word "occurred" is misspelled as "occured" within two realms strings.
|;previous
|262709|Dispensers do not dispense boats at the correct height.
|262712|Alternative recipes in recipe book do not appear on right-click.
|262714|The {{cd|key.keyboard.unknown}} string displayed within the key binds menu is improperly capitalized.
}}</onlyinclude>
